name: OCKWeekCalendarPageViewControllerDelegate
desc: A protocol that handles important events in a week calendar page view controller.

items.name: func weekCalendarPageViewController(OCKWeekCalendarPageViewController, didChangeDateInterval: DateInterval)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when there is a change in the date interval in the calendar.

items.name: func weekCalendarPageViewController(OCKWeekCalendarPageViewController, didSelectDate: Date, previousDate: Date)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when there is a change in the selected date in the calendar.

items.name: func weekCalendarPageViewController(OCKWeekCalendarPageViewController, didEncounterError: Error)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate your app encountered an unhandled error.
